name: Mewtiny
description:
Play as a cat pirate and try to steal the valuable treasures found in the enemy's ship in this chaotic game.

But be careful, the waves are powerful and your precious loot can easily be lost!

Made during the Ludum Dare 49 with the theme "Unstable".

Credits:

  • Alexandra NEMERY - Game design
  • Yann MOUËLLIC - Game design, Sleeping Beauty
  • Baptiste REY - Code, Pasta Maker
  • Paul REY - Game Art
  • Simon MARCHAND - Code
